dt: {bc}having or suggesting the {d_link|curves|curve:3} of a well-proportioned feminine figure

dt.t: The {wi}curvaceous{/wi} wooden mermaid shown on the cover … , forever staring into a mirror and waiting to comb her wind-tossed hair, was found in Wayland, Massachusetts …

dt: {bc}having a smoothly curving form or shape

dt.t: … the [golf] course sits on a {wi}curvaceous{/wi} mound of trash some 40 feet deep.
Rounded windows with decorative surrounds predominate, as do {wi}curvaceous{/wi} brackets under the exterior eaves.

shortdef: having or suggesting the curves of a well-proportioned feminine figure
having a smoothly curving form or shape
